doc:
Frank Middlemass https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frank_Middlemass 0 Francis George “Frank” Middlemass (28 May 1919 – 8 September 2006) was an English actor, who even in his early career played older roles. He is best remembered for his television roles as Rocky Hardcastle in As Time Goes By, Algy Herries in To Serve Them All My Days and Dr. Alex Ferrenby in Heartbeat. Middlemass was also active in the Royal Shakespeare Company and was the fourth and final actor to play Dan Archer in The Archers. Francis_George_“_Frank_”_Middlemass ( 28_May_1919 – 8_September_2006 ) was an_English_actor , who even in his_early_career played older_roles . He is_best_remembered for his_television_roles as Rocky_Hardcastle in As Time Goes By , Algy_Herries in To_Serve Them All_My_Days and Dr._Alex_Ferrenby in Heartbeat . Middlemass was also active in the_Royal_Shakespeare_Company and was the_fourth_and_final_actor to_play Dan_Archer in The_Archers .
